fields.title: About
fields.content:
Who is Annie?

Annie was a Chinese software engineer once, holding a master degree.

But everyday after work, she just found more fun in cooking, while others were still working overtime debugging...

So her husband, who is her NO.1 fan, suggest her, why don't you open your own restaurant?

That's how you came to know Panda Annie. 

 

My Specialty?

Technically, I think I am good at everything. HAHA. But Sichuan Food is my best.

 

 How to deliver?

Currently, I have to do delivery by myself. Just to office. Yes, you are right, i am the chef, the cook, the website developper and the delivery lady! 

"Why don't u hire someone to deliver?" Please refer to chapter "About License".

 

Where do you get your sources?

Most of them are from Carrefour (A cheaper supplier wanted!). Some ingredients are from Asian store.

 

How to contact me?

Hmmm, that's a good question! Please find it on the home page of Panda Annie.

 

Last but not least, enchanté!
